Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan clean swept the one-day international (ODI) series 3-0 against hosts Zimbabwe after winning the third and final ODI.
The first game of the three-match T20 series between Zimbabwe (ZIM) and Afghanistan (AFG) will be played on 11 June 2022 (Saturday) at Harare Sports Club, Zimbabwe.
The T20 encounter between the two teams will begin at 04:30 PM IST.
Zimbabwe will be looking to recover from the loss at home ground and make every effort to win the upcoming T20 series.
Afghanistan will be eyeing another series win to end their tour on a positive note.
